ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
4 Cameras, 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Indoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 30PCS Infrared LED, 65 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination.
4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime, 2TB HDD, 960×480 & 30FPS recording, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support
ProductInfo.Name: GW High-End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera Package, FREE LED Monitor, 4 Channel 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Resolution Real Time Recording, (4) x Sony COMS 1000 TV Lines Dome Indoor Security Cameras 2.8~12mm Vari-Focal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
